price: 本当に私はあなた方に、偉大なる日の懲罰を怖れているのだ」。
arabic: إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: innī akhāfu ʿalaykum ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
